name: UNDERLIE: Mixed Reality Underworld
summary:
Fight for Your Life in a Dark Dimension
Experience a revolutionary form of Mixed Reality! UNDERLIE uses a 3D scan of your room—or MULTIPLE ROOMS on a floor of your home—to transform your world into a sinister parallel dimension.

{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}
Blur the Line Between Realities
UNDERLIE uses advanced techniques based specifically on the tech of the Meta Quest 3. It uses the Quest 3's geometric room scan tech to build a fully-textured mesh in the shape of your room(s). It also...
